Tired, stressed. Will no doubt burst into tears when the plane leaves Glasgow to Cancun 31houts late... thank you Thomas Cook May I say fabulous customer service
Think I will burst into tears when this flight eventually takes off 😢
@ThomasCookCares Thank you x
@kaythmsn Sorry the amount of “items” I have acquired from various holidays would put a hoarder to shame 😝
@kaythmsn Sorry the crap buying keeps going on.....
@ThomasCookUK Flight number is MT2612 Glasgow to Cancun. We have passed security and now waiting in the gate number.
@samlou_1028 Thanks. Just getting ready to leave hotel and head over to the airport for check in. Find out what awaits us over there xx
@samlou_1028 What part are you going to?? We stayed at the Gothic Quarter. Beautiful place enjoy x
To all who are left without any communication in Glasgow from @ThomasCookUK where are you??
What worries me is that @ThomasCookUK haven’t replied to any of my messages on Facebook and Twitter! Somebody has been on hold for over an hour on the phone #worryingly @SkyNews @BBCNews
@ThomasCookUK I understand that a lot of people are asking the same questions. But come on you have not released an official statement on twitter or Facebook about what’s happening!!!
@ThomasCookUK this is extremely bad service from a well known company the not know what is happing is not fair at all !!!
@ThomasCookUK please can somebody get in touch and let me know what is happening to the cancelled flight from Glasgow 2/06/2018?
@terrie_dicksonX Will do if we get there lol. And you know me I certainly will do 😉 thank you xx
@terrie_dicksonX Cancun Mexico for two weeks looking forward to relaxing in the glorious heat etc xx
@terrie_dicksonX You relax and enjoy your weekend xx
@terrie_dicksonX We will survive I think. It could have been worse but that’s not worth thinking about...
@terrie_dicksonX Where you off to?? X
